job_title: Market Research Event Planner
company: 香港商榮格仕有限公司(RINGIER TRADE MEDIA LIMITED)
salary: 月薪 3.4萬~3.8萬元
job_info:
Become a key player in the Conference /events Business

One of the most dynamic industries today         

 工作任務：
- 會議策劃（線上及線下）及專案管理，包括市場/內容研究、主題設定、市場定位、新領域研究開發、邀約知名講者、現場協調和活動後跟進
- 與其他媒體公司、協會和其他合作夥伴建立戰略合作夥伴關係，以進一步建立和推廣活動
- 支持現場服務，保障實體活動的暢通（來賓註冊、餐點安排、現場票務、展區設置、贊助商現場事宜處理、商務媒合等）
- 支持台灣、中國、新加坡、香港銷售贊助，包括共同拜訪潛在贊助商
- 製作中英文宣傳資料，撰寫提案和EDM等
- 能自學研究新產業供應鏈、相關熱門趨勢和技術創新

The conference and events business in China (in S E Asia) is booming , both with virtual , physical and hybrid events. Suppliers and users are eager to network, learn, share ideas, conduct and develop new business. 

Ringier Conference and Events Co Ltd is a leading events organizer in China (in SE asia) holding over 40 industrial conferences and custom events yearly in the region. Supported by vast data base and media properties such as industry magazines, e newsletters, Wechat and other social media channels, our conference planners have at their disposal extensive resources that events companies have to offer. Not to mention a 15 year track record of holding successful events and an accumulation of a large network of speaker experts, qualified delegates and sponsors.

We are expanding – and are looking for a smart individual to join us in Taichung, Shanghai, Home based in S.E.Asia . Whilst previous conference planning experience is not required you have had some marketing and research experience. You know how to write well , you know how to conduct online research to identify industry trends, key topics and speakers. You know how to use social media  such as Linkedin (Wechat) to identify and communicate with potential delegates. You are not shy – and comfortable to reach out and talk  to the various stake holders – such as speakers, industry experts, sponsors , as well as be very visible and supportive on site .

If this sounds like you or you want to learn these skills and enter the Conference business , work with and be trained by some of the best in the business then please send us your resume today..  Also learn more about our future and past events at www.ringierevents.com (.cn)

 Responsibilities:
-         Conference production & project management, including market/content research, topic generation, market identification, program development, speaker invitation, on-site coordination and post-event follow up.
-          Develop strategic partnerships with other media companies, associations and other partners to further build and promote Ringier’s events
-         Support on-site service and Securing smooth flow of the physical event (guests traffic, food distribution, ticketing, exhibition area setup, engaging with business partners, matchmaking, and others).
-     Support sales of sponsorships including visiting potential sponsors 
-    Producing promotional materials and writing proposal and press release in Chinese & English.
-    Self-learning about the industry, hottest trends and technological innovations.TOEIC多益 (Blue730-855分)

job_info:
Micron in Taiwan
Micron’s global footprint is designed to deliver comprehensive customer teamwork, support and quality around the world and throughout the product lifecycle. Taiwan plays a meaningful role in strengthening Micron’s position in leading-edge DRAM.

Micron’s Taiwan sites include sales and technical support in Taipei along with state-of-the-art fabrication facilities in Taichung and Taoyuan that together comprise the company’s DRAM Center of Perfection. The Center’s goal is to achieve the most efficient and effective technology transfer and manufacturing ramp by combining front- and back-end manufacturing, product engineering and technology development roles.

Job Description
As an Engineering Operation Shift Engineer, you will be responsible for monitoring, sustaining, and improving your assigned area while working with production operators and area technicians to produce silicon-based semiconductor products.

Responsibilities and Tasks
Lead, manage, train and develop a team of Process Technicians to execute daily process operation

Dedicatedly monitor and drive performance of process critical metric and address any issues in a timely manner to achieve Fab quality, cost, cycle time and output goals

Monitor, analyze and dispose out of control events for established SPC rules for both process and defect related issues. (eg eCAP/DTS/QDR/SPACE/Scrap etc).

Ensure all SWRs are processed correctly and in a timely manner.

Assist 1st shift engineering and vendor support on long term down equipment and chronic process issues

Keep the Lead Engineer/Manager updated on all process related issues.

Partner with other Fab areas to solve issues that affect multiple areas.

Take the initiative to assume added responsibilities.

Initiate and formulate continuous improvement projects for yield/productivity/scrap improvements

All team members are required to complete their learning items within the stipulated time frame

For business process and/or QMS component that one is responsible or accountable for:

a) ensuring the QMS/business process that is effective and conforms to requirements

b) ensuring that the processes are delivering their intended outputs

c) reporting on QMS/business process performance and opportunities for improvement to management

d) ensuring the promotion of internal and external customer focus throughout the organization

e) ensuring the maintenance of the integrity of the QMS/ business process when changes are planned and implemented.

f) ensuring customer requirements are met

Education
Required

Bachelors Degree or equivalent experience

Engineering
Related field of study
Experience
Required

1 year experience in any of the following:

Semiconductor Manufacturing
Qualifications
Understanding of SPC and its applications in the area and knowledge of semiconductor equipment and processes.
Experience with the specific area equipment and processes.
Knowledge of Fab processes and a basic understanding of probe and param functions.
Excellent verbal and written communication, good PC skills, and strong data collection skills.
Willing to work any shift and that you be a behavioral example by being a dedicated problem solver, communicating openly, and taking responsibility.
Posses good team working skills, multi-tasking capabilities and being self-motivated
Ability to solve problems and address root causes
Team oriented with a strong focus on effective team dynamics
Statement

job_info:
The Team Member Advocate will provide 1:1 team member advocacy and support in multidisciplinary wellbeing topics, career coaching, personal and professional development, and support and referrals in mental health and employee relation services. Additional duties involve promotion of initiatives for wellness, culture and engagement, diversity and inclusion and employee relations programs to champion a meaningful team member experience at Micron.

Provide confidential consultation to team members who need support in personal and professional wellbeing topics, or workplace concerns. Deliver appropriate feedback and referrals, in alignment with Micron and community resources.
Foster an encouraging work environment. Contribute to positive team member engagement at site activities, lead team member site engagement events, encourage team member social connections.
Enable enhanced team member wellbeing. Assess the need for additional support via program awareness of a referral to healthcare resources.
Bring awareness to internal and external Micron resources. Programs include health and wellbeing resources provided by Micron and in the community.
Collaborate with wellbeing specialist to promote and provide wellbeing programs. Responsible for supporting the promotion and delivery of in-country wellbeing efforts and corporate programs.
Provide career counseling and serve as an extension of Reach conversations.
Receive workplace concerns. Assess if situation requires escalation, or referral for additional resources. Help to interpret workplace policies.
Integrate people related programs in areas of wellbeing, performance, diversity and inclusion, learning and development, and workplace policies at the individual level. Have a comprehensive understanding of all people programs.
Stay abreast of current workplace trends and world and community events that impact personal wellbeing.
Track interactions data to determine trends and potential workplace interventions. Provide feedback and suggestions to leadership.
Facilitate information tables, classes, and presentations on advocacy and coaching topics to grow site-level awareness and impact.
Ability and comfort speaking to all levels of leadership, and large groups.
Comprehensive understanding of all people related programs in areas of performance, wellness, diversity and inclusion, learning and development, and workplace policies.
In-depth knowledge of wellbeing programming and delivery of wellbeing support required.
Telephonic/Zoom support to Micron team members at additional sites.
Serve as a connection point between team members and other internal and external Micron resources.
Provide effective solutions for ensuring team members are aware of existing programs, resources and opportunities.
Contribute to driving team member engagement through creating opportunities to interact with TM’s at each site. Facilitate information tables, teaching classes, and giving presentations are examples.
Solicit feedback from team members and leaders to ensure programs and offerings are meeting their needs.

【職務條件】

-熟悉TCP/IP、UDP、WebSocket或HTTP等通訊協定的使用。
-熟悉IIS、Apache或Nginx等網站伺服器架設與維運。

job_title: 軟體工程師(Bluetooth)_汐止U-TOWN
company: GARMIN 台灣國際航電股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Our Core Platform Technology team in Taiwan has an exciting opportunity for a full-time Embedded Software Engineer who is passionate about Bluetooth Wireless technology and its application to audio. Even if you don’t have Bluetooth experience, but you have the passion to learn about Bluetooth and wireless technologies, keep reading!

Garmin Bluetooth enabled products enable hands-free audio in your car, streaming music from your wrist, and many other use cases that improve the lives of our customers. Software Engineers working on Bluetooth Audio technology will work with their mentors to develop their skillsets around and be responsible for the following activities at Garmin:
• Design, implement, debug, and optimize high-quality Bluetooth Audio subsystems.
• Verify performance through testing protocols and data analysis.
• Integrate, maintain, and contribute to 3rd party and open source software projects.
• Improve and tailor vendor drivers, stack and applications to our needs
• Evaluate designs for performance, maintainability, and identify potential security issues.
• Work directly with all product segments including Marine, Portable Aviation, Outdoor, Fitness, and Automotive to support product features related to Bluetooth
• Participate in code reviews, giving and receiving detailed feedback with other engineers.
• Work with the hardware team to ensure the correct hardware and RF architecture necessary to support a good customer experience.
• Support compliance engineers with Profile Test Suite (PTS) testing, Qualified Design ID (QDID) inspection, profile version analysis, etc.
• Provide reliable solutions to a wide range of difficult problems using sound problem solving techniques.

Candidates for this role should possess a Master‘s degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering, or Electrical Engineering AND a minimum of 1 year relevant work experience developing embedded software.

Requirements for this role include:
• Must possess proficiency in writing and debugging software in C/C++ on an embedded platform.
• Experience integrating and maintaining 3rd party software packages.
• Must excel at collaborative software development with teams distributed across multiple sites.
• Must possess the ability to manage multiple simultaneous development projects with different toolchains.
• Experience with communication protocols for systems utilizing UART, I2C, SPI and other such inter-IC interfaces.
• Experience identifying system architecture issues, software security risks and developing solutions.

Desirable skills include:
• Experience with Bluetooth stack or driver software development.
• Experience with distributed systems development .
• Must possess detailed knowledge of the Bluetooth BR/EDR core specification and experience with audio profile specifications including, but not limited to AVDTP, A2DP, AVRCP, HSP, and HFP.
• Experience integrating Bluetooth audio functionality on embedded systems.
• Experience debugging the Bluetooth BR/EDR protocol over-the-air with commonly available protocol analyzers/ sniffers.

job_info:
- 擔任單一窗口，與客戶連絡，協助客戶順暢，即時且迅速地與銀行開立現金帳戶。

On a daily basis, the Client Onboarding Specialist will be responsible for:

1.
1. Managing the Client onboarding experience, expectations and communications, ensuring transparency throughout the entire onboarding process both internally (RM, Operations, BSU, ASU, TTS, etc.) and externally to the client.

5. Ensuring the Client is able to successfully activate accounts and trained to the tools required for Citi’s channel access.
6. Ensuring accurate and timely tracking of end to end Turn Around Time (TAT) and managing to agreed targets/SLAs.

job_title: R&D Engineer - Golf
company: 美商威爾森運動器材股份有限公司台中分公司

job_info:
This position will play an integral role in the design and development of premium golf equipment at Wilson Golf. The work will touch all areas of product development and act as the conduit between the Chicago R&D group and the supplier base in Asia. This is a hands on position that will require strong knowledge of every aspect of the club design including engineering principles, cosmetic Design direction, and CAD communication. The position is located in Amer Sports Taichung office, sitting alongside product innovation teams for Wilson Racquet Sports, Basketball, and Baseball.

Responsibility:

- Facilitate effective communication between US-based design team and Asia-base suppliers, and to assist and coordinate in engineering, testing and cosmetic design objectives.
o Work as a bridge for timely & effective communication between US-based design team with Asia-base suppliers for product development information and status update, and to voice out any issues or potential problems
o Keep US-based design team updates timely about all relevant matters (issues, problems, alternatives and possible solutions), based on US-based design team direction & instruction to follow-up results in engineering, testing and cosmetic design objectives

o Monitor solutions implementation

- Perform rudimentary measurement and tests to ensure durability, reliability, and performance of premium golf equipment for prototypes, production and touring professional samples.

- Report and support to the manager

- Bachelor Degree in Mechanical Engineering

- 2-5 years experience in Golf engineering or R&D environment with a major golf company or supplier.

- Proficient in English for direct communication with Wilson USA.

- Familiarity in the use of CAD software as a means of reviewing concepts and designs.

- Capability of recognizing, reviewing and transferring CAD data in all its forms.

- Detail-oriented, for examining the nuance of shape and contour of complicated surfaces.

- Multi-tasking, work independently, and ability to work in a fast paced

- Positive to challenges in the development process, ability to propose viable solutions.

- Enthusiastic on the design & manufacturing of golf equipment is a plus機械工程學類

job_title: 【研發中心】資深網頁全端軟體工程師(台北內湖)
company: 網銀國際股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Senior Full Stack Web Software Engineer


【工作職責】
● 研發跨平台(PC、iOS和Android)網頁應用軟體
● 負責網頁前端與後端的程式開發工作
● 根據產品應用或營運服務的需求，進行程式設計框架及技術方案的設計和實現
● 結合技術和產品設計持續對前端使用體驗及前/後端運行效能進行優化
● 網站架設與維護
● 指導及提升其他程式人員能力
● 工作內容包括但不限於技術設計、軟體開發、測試和各類協作

【職務條件】
● 學歷條件：
-大學以上資訊、電機、電子、機械、物理、應數等理工相關科系畢業
● 經歷要求：
-3年以上相關工作經驗
● 職能要求：
-前端精通JavaScript或TypeScript程式語言
-後端精通C#及PHP程式語言
-精通HTML5、CSS3、jQuery、Ajax、Vue、React等前端技術與框架
-熟悉.Net Core或Laravel等後端開發框架
-熟悉C/C++、Java或Python等程式語言為佳
-熟悉WebAssembly開發與應用為佳
-熟悉RWD響應式網頁設計
-熟悉MVC框架
-對技術特定領域(例如3D Graphics、Computer Vision、SLAM、Deep Learning AI、Video/Audio Streaming、Video/Audio Codec、Motion Recognition、Data Mining、Blockchain、VR/AR等)其中至少一項有深入研究及相關開發經驗
-熟悉SQL與NoSQL資料庫系統與應用
-熟悉TCP/IP、UDP、WebSocket或HTTP等通訊協定的使用
-熟悉IIS、Apache或Nginx等網站伺服器架設與維運
-具備高承載Web服務開發經驗
-具備RESTful API設計與使用經驗
-具備AWS或GCP雲端服務使用與維運經驗
-具備英文讀寫能力，可閱讀英文技術論文及報告
● 其他要求
-對技術領域有持續的追求與熱情。
-溝通能力。
-團隊合作意識。
-追求卓越的工作態度。
-責任心。

初審未通過者，恕不另行通知。電算機學門,數學統計學門

job_title: Area Sales Manager(Bengaluru/Tirupati, India)
company: 喬越實業股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Required Qualifications:
1.Minimum 10 years of experience in sales, managing key customers accounts, working on developing new potential customers in the assigned area.
2.Experience of achieving sales targets, handling complex situations, glue material requirements of customers, inside sales or Client/Key Account management. Preferably in the B2B, retail technology, Electronics, 5G or Automotive Industries (including EV).
3.Exceptional interpersonal skills and ability to build relationships.
4.Strong written and verbal communication skills, with an ability to communicate effectively at all levels of an organization.
5.Strong organizational and project management skills, including prioritizing, scheduling, and time management.
6.Strong presentation skills including presenting companys introduction, reports to customer, vendor or internal organization.
7.Proactive attitude, detail-oriented, and a team player.
8.Willingness to standby and accept or return calls whenever customer/vendor has requirement or queries.

Core Responsibilities:
1.Offer improvement solutions and opportunities, recommending the use of glue dispensing solutions technology when applicable to increase productivity or drive process simplification.
2.Experience in providing support for data collection, preparing reports, customer‘s survey and forecast requirements.3.Work with the vendors/internal teams to know which materials will be suitable for customers requirement, improve selection of materials, identify and analyze profitability metrics and support business growth.
4.Managing key customers accounts, working on developing new potential customers in the assigned area.
5.Implement and track metrics for recording the success of the following:
6.Existing projects/materials and applications with exisiting materials for new projects and applications.
7.New materials and applications with new projects and applications.
8.Complete tasks assigned by Supervisor.

Who we are:
Sil-More Trade Private Limited, is the subsidiary of Taiwan based Sil-More Industrial Limited. Our office is located in Anna Salai, Chennai, Tamil Nadu.
Our main focus is the promotion of silicone adhesive materials and other base adhesives used in high-tech Industrial applications. We are glad to introduce domestic and well known American and European materials to satisfy the field application requirement for adhesive/sealants, encapsulates/potting, conformal coating, die adhesive/chip protection, conductive, thermal interface materials and engineering plastics in the following sectors: electronics, Industrial, automobile, semiconductor, optoelectronics and aerospace industries. Besides adhesives, we are also offering adhesive dispensing solutions and special plastic polymers solutions. Our principal is to become the Professional Integrated Total Solutions Provider and besides offering our total solutions we also fulfill our customer‘s requirement by staying close to them, providing our materials, best services and support. Hence assuring our vision of becoming the Leading Distribution Company in Asia.
SIl-More Group works closely with our customers externally and our team internally to create a new era of future technology together. We, Sil-More Trade Private Limited, invites and welcomes talented, super and ambitious sales people like you to our team. If you are hungry for growth and trying to build a long term career in sales then don‘t miss this chance to challenge to further your career goals and develop your skills.

job_title: ICG Loan Operations Team Head_企金放款作業部門主管
company: 花旗(台灣) 商業銀行股份有限公司(花旗銀行)
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
The Mgr provides full leadership and supervisory responsibility. Provides operational/service/control functions leadership and direction to team(s). Applies in-depth disciplinary knowledge through provision of value-added perspectives or advisory services. May contribute to the development of new techniques, models and plans within area of expertise. Strong communication and diplomacy skills are required. Generally has responsibility for volume, quality, timeliness of end results and shared responsibility for planning and budgets. Work affects an entire area, which eventually affects the overall performance and effectiveness of the sub-function/job family. Full supervisory responsibility, ensuring motivation and development of team through professional leadership to include duties such as performance evaluation, compensation, hiring, disciplinary and terminations as well as direction of daily tasks and responsibilities

•This role will manage preparing and reviewing loan documentation while providing support to a variety of tasks related to the loan process Activities will include independently processing and closing loans within a complex loans operation environment
•Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of how own loan function collectively integrates to contribute to achieving overall business goals
•Applies in-depth knowledge of concepts and procedures within own area to resolve issues related to loan documentation processes
•Responsible for escalating control gaps and issues to senior management
•Identifies loan related control deficiencies and implements appropriate procedures and solutions to mitigate any risk or control losses
•Directly impacts the area through shared responsibility for delivery of end results and formulation of procedures/process improvement
•Provides value-added perspective or advice that contributes to the development of new techniques and the improvement of the loan documentation processes for the area
•Resolves complex problems where the analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of loan procedures and industry standards
•Makes a significant contribution to change-the-bank projects and offers solutions at an advanced level
•Provides evaluative judgment based on analysis of factual information in complicated and unique situations, mostly but not limited to the loan documentation process
•Assumes informal/formal leadership role within the team, is involved in the coaching and training of new recruits, and provides guidance and support to junior staff
•Creates, develops and maintains effective relationships with colleagues, management, internal/external clients and stakeholders, and seeks to understand their needs and provides solutions
•Persuades and influences others through collaborative communication skills; may negotiate with external parties
•Individuals are expected to be a subject matter expert in one (or more) specific skill sets, business areas or products
•Appropriately assess risk when business decisions are made, demonstrating particular consideration for the firm‘s reputation and safeguarding Citigroup, its clients and assets, by driving compliance with applicable laws, rules and regulations, adhering to Policy, applying sound ethical judgment regarding personal behavior, conduct and business practices, and escalating, managing and reporting control issues with transparency, as well as effectively supervise the activity of others and create accountability with those who fail to maintain these standards.

job_title: EPG Logistics Operations 物流管理
company: 台灣應用材料股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Applied Materials EPG (Equipment Product Group) operations group is responsible for production of equipment and non system orders for 200mm Semi, legacy Semi metrology and inspection, solar inspection and Mask equipment globally in the AGS(Applied Global Services) product portfolio. EPG operations supports refurbishment, new systems, new product and upgrades for the ICAPS business unit focused on growth in the IOT, communications, automotive, power and sensor product markets. Our EPG team collaborates with customers globally including customers in Taiwan to meet critical equipment needs, solve manufacturing challenges, and make equipment more productive. The growth in ICAPS markets has led to great new opportunities in the 200mm product space and the opportunity for factory expansion in Taiwan to build and ship EPG products for our customers in Taiwan and globally.

Now we are looking for a Logistics Operations Supervisor who will be in charge of logistics operations at EPG Tainan factory, this role will manage factory on-site 3PL team’s daily operations and performance on components receiving, finished goods shipping and exceptions handling; and cooperate with other stakeholders to ensure logistics supports in time and in place to fulfill manufacture requirements and customer orders delivery.

Key Responsibilities
 Interpret, analyze, and present metrics/KPIs to Management. Drive corrective actions with appropriate groups to improve metrics and address exceptions.
 Lead small to mid-size operational task forces or projects
 Ensure adherence to established business processes. Support development of new business processes. Develop and implement process improvement projects to increase service level performance and/or minimize costs. Project scope is straight forward and has local impact.
 Ensure compliance and control to Quality standards. Process and report weekly status of “in-house” process control reports, including in-transit, cycle count, inventory receiving and shipping reports.
 Review inventory control reports for discrepancies and provide recommendations to management for corrective actions.
 Gather data requirements for internal/external audit requests
Functional Knowledge
• Demonstrates conceptual and practical expertise in own discipline and basic knowledge of related disciplines
Business Expertise
• Has knowledge of best practices and how own area integrates with others; is aware of the competition and the factors that differentiate them in the market
Leadership
• Acts as a resource for colleagues with less experience; may lead small projects with manageable risks and resource requirements
Problem Solving
• Solves complex problems; takes a new perspective on existing solutions; exercises judgment based on the analysis of multiple sources of information
Impact
• Impacts a range of customer, operational, project or service activities within own team and other related teams; works within broad guidelines and policies
Interpersonal Skills
• Explains difficult or sensitive information; works to build consensus
Other Requirements
 Fluent English communication skill in writing and speaking
 Factory logistics operation or FTZ operation experiences will be a plus
Years of Experience
 7 Years of working experience in related logistics fields, e.g. manufacture logistics operation, warehouse operation, 3PL or 3PL management.
Travel
 Occasional, may need to travel to KHH FTZ warehouse sometimes.經濟社會及心理學門,商業及管理學門,工程學門

job_title: 【➼嘉義大埔美】Manufacturing Engineer (Carbon Crank) 製造工程師(碳纖製程)
company: 瑞士商弗克司股份有限公司台灣分公司

job_info:
o Familiar with Carbon product forming process, related mechanical and machine structure.
o Ability to design production tooling with knowledge of tolerances & materials
o Working knowledge of Lean 6-Sigma methods to improve manufacturability, quality or reduce cost
o Apply DMAIC problem solving techniques to address root cause of issues
o Improve labor productivity through flow enhancements, value stream analysis and bottleneck reduction
o Reduce WIP generated scrap through process improvements, training and tooling
o Develop error proof manufacturing solutions, or “Poka Yoke”, to consistently guarantee quality
o Root cause investigation/resolution for variance and quality issues; initiate opportunities for data collection from the assembly line for continuous improvement.
o Identify assembly/design issues to generate potential cost savings and implement standardization opportunities
o Strong analytical skills in assemblies, work flow, scrap reduction, fixturing and assembly jigs
o Ability to manage time effectively to achieve defined goals under a set of deadlines
o Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to interact effectively with the engineering group, supplier development group, QC, purchasing, inventory management, and the general manager
o Strong work ethic with a commitment to get things done

RESPONSIBILITIES:

o Identify and implement opportunities to improve manufacturing environment and capability
 Augment standard work instructions and advise on process as necessary
 Create visual aids, production aids, jigs and fixtures for production and quality as relates to manufacturing
 Investigate and arrange manufacturing equipment and tooling procurement, work with tooling vendors to see through the building of tooling
 Document justification for purchase/ROI analysis of tooling or aids
 Identify training needs for manufacturing related to assembly process, arrange or conduct training as appropriate
o Provide engineering support to Manufacturing, Design Engineering, Purchasing, QC and Management
 Identify, research, implement solutions to issues related to assembly/manufacturing, engineering documentation and quality on new product and product released to production
 Lead Taiwan manufacturing engineering team and work closely with Global Team to implement solutions
 Lead cross function review meeting on process standardize, create new product Process layout to meet design intent.
 Identify, evaluate and implement design changes to improve manufacturability, improve quality, reduce costs and reduce material variances
 Complete any associated drawing mark-ups/revisions and ensure any required BOM revisions are completed with design team
 Problem investigation and resolution of field reports, service and warranty, and supplier issues
 Create, approve, and coordinate any temporary deviations required
 Attend/facilitate meetings with manufacturing and purchasing to ensure communication and review issues/opportunities
 Provide feedback to Design Engineering group to ensure incorporation into new designs
o Cost Reduction and Standardization
 Identify, evaluate and implement changes to assembly process to reduce material and labor costs
 Identify standardization opportunities relating to assembly, work flow and tooling
o Provide input on new designs
 As new designs are released, provide feedback to the design group as to the manufacturability of design and capability of assembly line to produce design
o Perform other duties as assigned
 May be requested to support other tasks within organization to support business activities.機械工程學類,航太工程學類,河海及船舶工程學類

Let us grow together in Glohow and create all kinds of creative possibilities together!

-Formulate product positioning, customer group analysis, product goals, and strategies, and propose adjustment plans.
-Operational activity planning and proposals.
-Data analysis of current operating conditions and proposal of follow-up optimization plans.
-Observation and analysis of game environment and analysis of competing products.

 ■ Other conditions:
-More than three years of relevant experience in game operation.
-English or Korean communication (listening, speaking, reading, writing).
-Inter-departmental communication and coordination, with the concept of teamwork.
-Interest and enthusiasm for the game industry and mobile applications, and familiar with the mobile game market.
-Need to go through more than 1 complete game product launch cycle and understand the various procedures of product launch

Interested parties are welcome to send your resume to: job_product@glohow.com

Thank you.

job_title: 行銷企劃專員 (Marketer)
company: 克爾豪股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
我們正在尋找能夠和我們一起創造意義並開創最佳方向的行銷人員。
如果你富有挑戰力、好奇心，具有團隊精神，想與優秀的成員們一起工作，請立即聯繫我們。


■ 工作內容:
- 為新遊戲上市和遊戲制定/執行營銷策略
- 品牌行銷和創意策劃
- 全球廣告代理和媒體商的管理、經營及合作
- 策劃及執行各樣行銷活動/促銷
- 成效數據分析/指標管理/成效報告
- Facebook、Google Ads 和 Ad Network 執行
- 開發全球有效行銷渠道和媒體
- 全球媒體自助化、優化和媒體效率管理

■ 其他條件:
- 有遊戲上市行銷執行經驗
- 有AE經驗的遊戲公司行銷人員或廣告公司優先

- 有責任心和良好的溝通能力
- 對遊戲產品有分析/邏輯思維和理解力
- 跨部門協作系統文件使用及溝通技巧
- 使用英語進行內部/外部交流（韓語優先考慮）
- 具撰寫戰略推導和計劃實施相關報告的經驗

有意者歡迎將履歷發送至: job_marketing@glohow.com
感謝你。 



We are looking for a Taiwanese Marketer who can define things and find the best answer together with us.
If you are a challenger, have the curiosity, collaborative spirit with superb members, please contact us.


What to do:
        - Establishment/execution of marketing strategies for new game launches and live games
        - Brand marketing and creative planning
        - Global advertising agency and media company management, leadership, collaboration
        - Planning and executing various events/promotions
        - Performance data analysis/indicator management/performance reporting and reporting
        - Perform marketing activities using Facebook, Google Ads, and Ad Network
        - Discover new global performance marketing channels and media
        - Global media self-serving, optimization and media efficiency management

You need to:                
        - Experience in New game launch marketing execution        
        - Game company marketer or advertising agency with experience in AE is preferred        
        - Practical experience with an understanding of 3rd party attribution tools and Ad-Tech        
        - Responsibility and good communication skills        
        - Those who have analytical/logical thinking and understanding of game products        
        - Systematic document creation and communication skills for collaboration with relevant departments        
        - Able to communicate internally/externally using English (Korean is an advantage)        
        - Experienced in writing a report including strategy derivation and implementation plan        

Thank you for your interest.

job_title: 【研發中心】網頁全端軟體開發組長
company: 網銀國際股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Lead Full Stack Web Software Engineer

【工作職責】
● 領導研發跨平台(PC、iOS和Android)網頁應用軟體。
● 負責網頁前端與後端的程式開發工作。
● 根據產品應用或營運服務的需求，進行程式設計框架及技術方案的設計和實現。
● 結合技術和產品設計持續對前端使用體驗及前/後端運行效能進行優化。
● 網站架設與維護。
● 程式人員工作安排與管理。
● 指導及提升程式團隊人員能力。
● 負責面試及培訓新進人員。
● 工作內容包括但不限於技術設計、軟體開發、測試和各類協作。

【職務條件】
● 學歷條件：
- 大學以上資訊、電機、電子、機械、物理、應數等理工相關科系畢業。
● 職能要求：
- 前端精通JavaScript或TypeScript程式語言。
- 後端精通C#及PHP程式語言。
- 精通HTML5、CSS3、jQuery、Ajax、Vue、React等前端技術與框架。
- 對技術特定領域(例如3D Graphics、Computer Vision、SLAM、Deep Learning AI、Video/Audio Streaming、Video/Audio Codec、Motion Recognition、Data Mining、Blockchain、VR/AR等) 其中至少一項有深入研究及相關開發經驗。
- 熟悉.Net Core或Laravel等後端開發框架。
- 熟悉C/C++程式語言。
- 熟悉Java或Python等程式語言為佳。
- 熟悉WebAssembly開發與應用。
- 熟悉RWD響應式網頁設計。
- 熟悉MVC框架。
- 熟悉SQL與NOSQL資料庫系統與應用。
- 熟悉TCP/IP、UDP、WebSocket或HTTP等通訊協定使用。
- 熟悉IIS、Apache或Nginx等網站伺服器架設與維運。
- 具備高承載Web服務開發經驗。
- 具備RESTful API設計與使用經驗。
- 具備AWS或GCP雲端服務使用與維運經驗。
- 具備技術團隊領導能力與管理經驗。
- 具備專案規劃、組織與執行能力。
- 具備英文讀寫能力，可閱讀英文技術論文及報告。
● 其他要求：
-對技術領域有持續的追求與熱情。
-溝通能力。
-團隊合作意識。
-追求卓越的工作態度。
-責任心。

☆欲應徵者請投遞履歷後等待書面初審合格後之面試通知。
初審未通過者，恕不另行通知。數學統計學門,電算機學門

job_title: Offline Marketing Manager
company: 閃電咖啡股份有限公司(Flash Coffee_閃電咖啡股份有限公司)
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
您對咖啡和科技的結合有興趣嗎？那您也許會想加入我們Flash Coffee的團隊！

閃電咖啡在雅加達，曼谷和新加坡開始拓展業務，並得到了Rocket Internet（以建立foodpanda，Lazada，Zalora...等公司而聞名）和Delivery Hero的支持，Delivery Hero是一家全球線上食品交付領域的跨國公司，業務範圍涵蓋40多個國家，而我們的目標，是要成為亞洲最大的新型態咖啡連鎖店之一。

在泰國和新加坡，我們迅速擴張，目前開展了70多家分店，平均每月新開設6家新分店。
在接下來的幾個月，我們將快速進入台灣市場，開設更多的實體店面，所以我們需要您的熱情和參與！

就是現在！
加入Flash Coffee，與我們一同高速成長！


We are now looking for an Offline Marketing Manager to join our growing Marketing team.

Reporting to the local Head of Marketing, you will be building, managing, and scaling a fast-growing offline marketing team. You will be fully owning our offline marketing strategy for Taiwan, being responsible for the day-to-day execution of performance-oriented store launches and promotional campaigns as well as identifying new opportunities for growth.

The ideal candidate is a self-starter, results-driven, and highly analytical.

What You‘ll Do:

1. Build and manage Flash Coffee’s offline marketing team, with direct ownership of our offline marketing strategy and budget.
2. Develop, execute and optimize our store launch strategy and tactics
3. Run performance-oriented customer acquisition and brand awareness campaigns across offline, out-of-home, and non-digital channels including store marketing, flyering, TV, radio, print, OOH, and other offline media
4. Improve the performance of all offline initiatives by analyzing data, and recommend ways of spending budgets
5. Recruit, manage and grow a high performing team of promoters and brand ambassadors
6. Drive forward marketing analytics and attribution projects that help us better understand the impact of offline campaigns on our growth and our brand metrics
7. Drive test and scale opportunities in emerging channels and formats to ensure that Flash Coffee is at the forefront of trends in offline marketing

Skills and Experience You Will Bring:

1. 2+ years of relevant work experience
2. Deep bias towards analytics and measurement, and extensive experience with having your work measured against or towards revenue-related goals
3. Proven track record in project management and budget planning
4. Highly proficient in Microsoft Excel/Google Sheets
5. Familiarity with the world of offline marketing including TV, OOH, Print, Audio & Flyering would be preferred
6. Previous hands-on experience running offline campaigns and managing an offline channel on a direct, day-to-day basis would be preferred
7. Intuitive knowledge of the local offline media landscape and how Flash Coffee can best fit within it
8. Excellent managerial and mentoring skills together with a passion and ability to coach and develop more junior talent
9. You thrive in dynamic, uncertain, and fast-moving environments, a hustler
10. Excellent communication skills
11. Passion for coffee & tech

What we offer:

1. Being part of a fast-growing startup with a lot of responsibilities from day one
2. A vibrant and international team
3. Regular company and team events

job_title: 軟體設計工程師
company: 湘富科技企業有限公司
salary: 月薪 3萬~3.8萬元
job_info:
我就直話直說吧

薪水就一般般，不會要你肝。
(沒特殊事情的話下班時間到就下班，絕對不會要你常態加班)

如果很不幸的有急件要趕，我簽加班單絕對不手軟。

公司環境不怎麼樣是鐵皮屋工廠，但是夏天冷氣隨你開。
(以後公司賺更多錢了可能會搬家)

部門內有年輕的UI設計師妹子，等你來認識。

老闆常常不在公司，但是上班時間我還是會盯著你。

我們有一堆的開發的想法，但是需要有人幫我們實現。

對你的工作技能沒把握?我們教你。

對你自己沒信心勝任這份工作?我們培養你。

說穿了 你要錢~我要人~
沒要你一定要選擇加入我們，但是我覺得我開出來的條件在同業中應該是不錯的
公司主要業務為POS販售，POS軟體硬體都有做。說穿了就是SI整合商。
SI整合商賺不賺錢?這個在業界都可以打聽，是不愁吃穿。
我們就是整合商做久了，太無聊閒閒沒事做跳下來開個新部門自己寫寫程式囉~

寫寫POS程式幫助千千萬萬個地方的小商家賺錢，會點C#跟.NET開發是基本。WPF會一點我會更開心
總有地方要放Data吧?會點資料庫規劃跟分析應該也不為過吧?
你寫出來的Code總需要Debug吧?除個小蟲也該也在合理範圍

你以為就每天寫寫程式那麼一成不變的工作嗎?寫累了我們也可以玩玩系統整合(整合信用卡機、PAY、ERP系統等周邊)
軟體硬體通通可以玩，公司做SI整合就是有一堆玩具，等你來挑戰。
人嘛~都會膩的，我懂，只要你有心，公司資源多到爆炸，來磨練自己也是不錯的。

沒有要你幹大事，但是你要有嘗試新的技術研究的熱誠跟勇氣
指派給你的任務我需要你有責任心的完成它，在我的團隊裡面我也希望你可以肯溝通跟分享給整個團隊
寫程式時遇到瓶頸了嗎?我相信團隊內應該有人可以幫助你，只要你提問，大家應該會很樂意幫忙

喔對了 想加薪嗎? 做得好我們當然會加薪，但是你也要証明你的能力給我看，不然我在老闆面前我也不知道怎麼提加薪吧?
看了覺得加薪有困難? 我每半年都會看你完成的事項來評定是否加薪。沒那麼難，都看你平時表現

累了想休假? 我不想聽謊話你也不需要瞎掰 合理範圍內我一定准假
制度都依照勞基法，公司見紅就休。員工旅遊每年都是基本。

這樣的條件開給各位參考看看，如果有興趣歡迎你來鐵皮屋找我聊聊，你也可以開條件，可以答應的條件我會答應，不行的我也會說無法。絕對誠實以對。
希望你可以加入我們成為一份子，我相信你一定會在我這邊收穫蠻多的。
歡迎你投履歷給我~

job_title: Open Faculty Positions/Department of Industrial Engineering and Management at Yu
company: 元智大學
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）

job_title: Backend Developer - Advertising
company: 狄卡科技股份有限公司(Dcard)
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
【投遞方法】請至：https://grnh.se/4afac7ed1us 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

Dcard 是在年輕族群有極高滲透率與影響力的社群平台。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，讓平凡人分享不平凡故事的新世代社群服務。我們的用戶來自世界各地，除了既有社群服務與版圖，我們也正全力擴張發展新型業務及跨國市場。

面對快速變化的社群生態，我們期待更多優秀的人才加入 Dcard。為了達成這個目標，我們需要 Backend Developer - Advertising 加入我們，根據業務與使用者需求，和產品團隊合作開發不同的產品服務。

【為什麼你該加入 Dcard？】

Dcard 產品從抽卡延伸至論壇、電商等、服務對象從大學生到所有年輕人。我們正在以成長型思維打造一個快速成長、持續擴展影響力的組織。團隊聚焦長期使命願景與戰略，一同專注目標並持續突破。我們面向世界，在不同領域創造更多的發展與機會，也不滿足於現有版圖。我們需要你的加入幫助 Dcard 在更多領域提供價值給使用者！

【關於 Dcard 的工程團隊】

你將和 Product Manager、Engineer 和 Designer 一同合作，打造社群、電商、跨國市場等不同產品。身為 Dcard 工程團隊的一員，除了功能面開發，你也會專注優化開發者體驗與架構，並評估導入新的技術。在 Dcard 你將會面臨許多有趣挑戰，著手開發流量大的產品，不斷調整並改善現有的架構，提供順暢的服務給千萬使用者。

後端開發主要是使用 Golang，跟據不同的功能搭配適合的架構、DB 與第三方服務來完成廣告相關的功能。除了業務需求之外，你也會跟據維運情況，進行架構優化並評估導入新的技術、執行 data migration 與解決技術債。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】

· 短期
　· 透過 on-board projects 與 mentor 的討論，熟悉開發工具、規範與程式架構。
　· 瞭解負責產品的方向，熟悉相關部份的程式與架構。
　· 與合作的 Product Manager、Engineer 和 Designer 進行交流，了解團隊協作工具。
　· 跟據需求開發功能並兼顧程式的可讀性與維護性，並且進行完整測試。
· 長期
　· 與開發團隊進行深入的需求討論，能夠跟據時程、開發成本等面向提出建議。
　· 全面瞭解整體的程式與架構，跟據目前實作的優缺點，改善目前的廣告系統架構。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Backend Developer - Advertising 具備以下能力】

· 具有廣告技術相關領域經驗
· 3 年以上後端開發工作經驗
· 熟悉 Golang
· 具有 Unit Testing 與 Integration testing 經驗
· 具有 Git 使用經驗
· 使用過並熟悉關聯式資料庫(PostgreSQL/MySQL/MariaDB) 與 NoSQL 資料庫

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】

· 具有 DevOps 經驗
· 使用 Cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure) 的經驗
· 熟悉 MongoDB
· 熟悉 Redis
· 熟悉 Nodejs
· 熟悉 k8s
· 熟悉並整合過 CI/CD
· 熟悉程式與資料庫效能調校
· 樂於參與開源社群

【薪資待遇】

· 面議

【注意事項】

· 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡你！
· 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。

job_title: Backend Developer
company: 狄卡科技股份有限公司(Dcard)
salary: 年薪 100萬~160萬元
job_info:
【投遞方法】請至：https://grnh.se/7mu8qf1 投遞履歷，我們會以這邊收到的履歷為主。

後端開發主要是使用 Golang，少部份模組使用 Nodejs，根據不同的功能搭配適合的架構、DB 與第三方服務來完成大流量的功能。除了業務需求之外，你也會跟據維運情況，進行架構優化並評估導入新的技術、執行 data migration 與解決技術債。

【你將在團隊參與⋯】

· 短期
　· 透過 on-board projects 與 mentor 的討論，熟悉開發工具、規範與程式架構。
　· 瞭解負責產品的方向，熟悉相關部份的程式與架構。
　· 與合作的 Product Manager、Engineer 和 Designer 進行交流，了解團隊協作工具。
　· 跟據需求開發功能並兼顧程式的可讀性與維護性，並且進行完整測試。
· 長期
　· 與開發團隊進行深入的需求討論，能夠跟據時程、開發成本等面向提出建議。
　· 全面瞭解整體的程式與架構，跟據目前實作的優缺點，並且提出改善。
　· 持續學習新技術、主動分享並將嘗試適合的技術導入。

【我們期待看到一個優秀的 Backend Developer 具備以下能力】

· 3 年以上後端開發工作經驗
· 熟悉 Golang
· 具有 Unit Testing 與 Integration testing 經驗
· 具有 Git 使用經驗
· 使用過並熟悉關聯式資料庫(PostgreSQL/MySQL/MariaDB) 與 NoSQL 資料庫

【如果你擁有以下能力，那就更棒了！】

· 具有 DevOps 經驗
· 使用 Cloud (GCP, AWS, Azure) 的經驗
· 熟悉 MongoDB
· 熟悉 Redis
· 熟悉 Nodejs
· 熟悉 k8s
· 熟悉並整合過 CI/CD
· 熟悉程式與資料庫效能調校
· 樂於參與開源社群

【薪資待遇】

· 1,000,000 ~ 1,600,000 / year

【注意事項】

· 如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡你！
· 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知。

job_title: System Support Engineer  美商電信系統支援工程師
company: Sansay, Inc.
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Since its founding in 2002, Sansay has been dedicated to the development, manufacturing, and sales of leading VoIP and telecommunication solutions. Today, the company is a world leader, with products distributed to hundreds of service providers in over 100 countries. As the recognized leader in the telecommunications and VoIP industry, Sansay was named to the Pulver 100 list of top privately held growth companies.

We are looking for system support engineers. Job duties include interfacing to carrier customers on VoIP network planning, deployment, and troubleshooting procedures. Also requires teaming up with engineering resources to solve network, protocol and system level issues.

Responsible for answering carrier technical support requests through phone/email/IM. Support customer’s maintenance, upgrade and operations plans. Coordinate with remote system engineers for larger network projects. And upon occasion provide customer training on Sansay Session Border Controller product lines.

美商Sansay公司是一家有很好工作環境，成長快速的高科技公司. 我們在尋找一位系統維運支援工程師，其工作職掌包括：與客戶直接面對面接觸，客戶的VoIP網路規劃、運用、以及問題排除的操作程序，能配合軟體工程團隊 (維運與開發)，來解決網路及網路協定與不同系統階層之間的問題。

主要負責工作是：透過電話，或Email，或及時訊息(IM) 來答覆客戶技術支援的需求，支援客戶的維運、系統版本更新、及操作程序規劃，能夠協調遠端工程師共同處理在大型網路上的系統，偶而需要提供客戶Sansay SBC產品群的教育訓練。資訊科學學門,網路學類,系統設計學類

4. 須熟悉Power Point、EXCEL操作。
■備註：視專案需要須配合延長工時

【行動產品營運規劃、資料分析與產品推廣】M06
■類別一：行動企客業務營運規劃與資料分析
1. 學歷：國內外大學資工、資管、統計、數學、財務金融及商業管理等相關院所及科系畢業尤佳。

(2) 辦理行動企客業務年度營運計畫撰寫與擬定。
(3) 辦理年度營運專案策略規劃及績效檢視追蹤。
(4) 主管交辦事項及跨部門溝通協調。
3. 所需專長及工作經驗：
(1) 熟稔office軟體(尤以Excel、Word、Powerpoint需精熟)，並對資料分析結果有解讀能力。
(2) 孰悉關聯式資料庫軟體(包括MySQL、Oracle、SQL Server、Teradata等資料倉儲軟體操作)或具備量化資料統計分析、Data Mining等經驗尤佳。
(3) 工作態度熱誠主動積極，口條表達清晰，具邏輯推理及簡報能力，樂於學習與接受新知，抗壓性高且勇於接受挑戰。
(4) 具備相關工作經驗至少1年，3年以上者尤佳。
■類別二：行動企客業務產品推廣
1. 學歷：國內外大學商學、管理、社會科學、文學、外國語文、國際事務、及新聞傳播等相關院所及科系畢業尤佳。
2. 工作內容：
(1) 負責行動企客產品服務行銷與推廣、專案規劃與分析、與通路及維運單位合作與溝通、客訴協作處理。
(2) 與企業客戶洽談業務、締結合約及維繫經營、追蹤檢討企客營收與製作分析簡報。
(3) 企業客戶市場研究報告撰寫及分析。
(4) 主管臨時交辦之專案規劃與執行。
3. 所需專長及工作經驗：
(1) 熟稔office軟體(尤以Excel、Word、Powerpoint需精熟)，並對資料分析結果有解讀能力。
(2) 表達能力好、工作態度熱誠主動，樂於學習及與人群溝通、積極，有業務、行銷及帳務等工作經驗、具優良外語能力者。
(3) 具相關工作經驗至少1年，3年以上者尤佳。資訊工程學類,數學統計學門

5.內部環境自由，可自由參與其他專案：大數據、機器學習、資料庫等專案。

 任職資格
1. 三年以上後端開發經驗，有主機責任感。
2. 熟稔 GCP 和 GKE 維運，具備 System, Networking, Automation, Security, 及 Architecting 知識。
3. 程式開發以 TypeScript 和 Golang 為主，Python 為輔，至少熟稔 TypeScript，且不排斥學習其他語言。
4. 熟稔 RDBS 資料庫操作和維運。
5. 具備 Git 和 CI/CD 經驗。
6. 重視程式碼品質，具備 Design Pattern 經驗，追求 Clean code，且有 Code review 的經驗。

job_title: Apple-Precision Optics Molding Engineer
company: (派遣)萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
Job Summary：
We are looking for a process engineer to join our engineering team to make a big difference in the future of Apple. This position requires close collaboration with other experts at Apple, and is focused on working directly with optics suppliers to develop high precision manufacturing processes new to industry. This role also involves ensuring the accuracy and reliability of metrology techniques used for optical components.

Key Responsibilities：
• Directly work with precision optics molding suppliers, and develop new injection molding techniques for optical components such as lenses. 
• Implement molding process SOPs to ensure repeatable quality.
• Review metrology equipment and fixtures to ensure they are accurate and repeatable, drive GRR analysis, and implement measurement SOPs.
• Help develop cosmetic and visual inspection methods to ensure quality, implement SOPs and train operators.
• Visit suppliers on a daily basis to ensure Apple team’s requests are executed in a timely way, and SOPs are being followed by operators.
• Review, analyze and interpret measurements and critical process data, and collaborate with rest of Apple team to draw actionable conclusions and implement improvements.
• Review and execute quality control documents on a daily basis to ensure critical specs and in process quality control meet requirement.
• Drive process trouble shooting, failure analysis of optical components, and implementation of corrective actions on-site.
• Use data analysis tools (such as JMP, Matlab, Python, etc) and presentation software (such as PowerPoint or Keynote) to prepare quantitative daily reports and clear slides to communicate top issues, learnings, failure analysis and corrective action plans and results.

*本職缺為派遣工作，派遣一年一簽光電工程學類,材料工程學類

Preferred Qualifications

Bouns Points：

2. Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion,and processing of large data sets
3. Experience in designing high scalable and available applications(Elasticsearch)

5. Experience in configuring and executing automated tests in CI/CD tools

The data engineer will work with manufacture teams and Continuous Improvement teams. They are going to be part of a project team to develop an end-to-end solution for manufacture operators to enhance or improve their operation efficiency and effectiveness by optimize the process monitoring, prediction and decrease failure rate.

In a data scientist role, you will be responsible for modeling complex manufacturing process problems, discovering insights and identifying opportunities through the use of statistical, machine learning, mining and visualization techniques.


Responsibilities:

• Collaborate with stakeholders to identify the business requirements, formulate lists of questions in analytics terms, and the expected outcome;
• Identify and select relevant and credible data sources, and provide technical instructions to data analysts to collect, integrate and mine data;

• Conducts advanced data analysis and complex algorithm to help stakeholders to discover and quantify leading information.
• Solves stakeholders’ problems through analytics and communicate results and methodologies through an iterative collaboration process.
• Partner with stakeholders to ensure the expected qualification and assurance of the information.
• Design and participate in implementation of analytics pipelines and visualization by collaborating with other digital/site team members.

job_title: 知名美商 3M- Demand Planner for GCA SIBG Supply Chain Planning
company: (派遣)萬寶華企業管理顧問股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
The person hired for the position of Demand Planner will be responsible for creating the demand plan that is critical for planning material flow throughout the supply chain. The focus of the Demand Planner is creating an unbiased demand plan with the highest accuracy possible.

1. Gathering and applying market intelligence to the demand plan. Market intelligence may come from sales, marketing, key accounts, and other sources including management of any intelligence received via EDI
2. Managing demand planning exceptions related to out of control demand, forecast bias, unusual month to date demand, etc.
3. Leveraging forecast performance metrics tools to measure accuracy, assess the quality and frequency of overrides, assess forecast bias, and identify and address the largest sources of forecast error
4. Participating in the Integrated Business Planning (IBP) process with a particular focus on the alignment between the demand plan and the business plan (OP/QOR)
5. Managing the demand planning aspects of the product life cycle (new products, end of life, and phase-in / phase-out)
6. Maximizing the effectiveness of the statistical forecast by adjusting/cleansing historical demand and determining appropriate levels of aggregation for calculating the statistical forecast
7. Maintaining data integrity in the demand planning system by performing needed realignments and removing obsolete data
8. Recommend optimal settings for forecast consumption parameters that govern the way in which the forecast is netted by sales orders
9. Supports the Supply and Production Planning organization through key inputs for development of inventory strategies on existing items, new products, and product phase-outs.
10. Supports Business Group LSS initiatives through data analytics and continuous process improvement

job_title: [Uber Eats] Operation Specialist 生鮮雜貨市場CRM專員_SMS_855
company: (派遣)藝珂人事顧問股份有限公司
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
[Uber Eats] Operation Specialist 生鮮雜貨市場CRM專員

此部門為Uber Eats的新事業部門(New Verticals)，主要負責生鮮雜貨、日常用品、美妝、醫藥與零售領域產品的外送服務，將是Uber Eats的新發展事業。此職缺主要協助廣告投放或線上行銷等CRM(顧客關係管理)活動，並透過數字成效優化，希望藉此增加使用用戶，或使舊用戶重複使用外送服務

如果你有廣告投放、數據分析、CRM、社群行銷等行銷經驗/思惟，並對於外送產業有興趣，歡迎應徵，有相關經驗/能力的應屆畢業生，也歡迎喔！

[About the Role]
Uber Eats New Verticals is one of Uber‘s newest global-in-scope services, with Grocery, Convenience Store, Cosmetics, Pharmacy, and Retail segments, which is our next 10^10 business.
You will be executing our CRM campaigns across different channels (in-app banner, email, push notifications, SMS, etc.), optimizing customer experience by improving communications, and deriving actionable insights from the data.

[Responsibilities]
1.	Drive and execute lifecycle communications across different stages of the customer journey from customer acquisition, engagement to churn management.
2.	Plan and execute CRM campaigns from campaign design, optimization to activation implementation.
3.	Track campaign results and optimize communications by designing and running experiments or A/B testing.
4.	Co-evaluate campaign effectiveness with data analysis tools (e.g. MS Excel, SQL, and internal CRM tools) to monitor key metrics and provide actionable insights and recommendations.
5.	Work closely with cross-functional teams including Marketing, Public Relations, Accounting Manager, and Legal to deliver works.
6.	Streamline regular working processes by leveraging global resources and systems.
7.	Bring fresh ideas to the team and initiate innovative events proactively.

[Key Requirements]
- Minimum years (0-2 years) of experience in data-driven Marketing/ Communications/ CRM. Creative experience is a plus.
- Experience in a Media/ Entertainment/ Advertising/ FMCG company preferred.
- Proficient in MS Excel (Google Sheet); knowledge of Adobe Illustration
- Strong organization, planning, and project management skills with a detail-oriented mentality.
- Ability to take initiative in a constantly changing work environment with a hands-on and self-driven attitude.
- Good command of reading and written English is a plus.

job_title: 【台灣佈局最完整的美商】Network Engineer(派遣中/南科玻璃基板大廠)

salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
超過165年以來，外商將其在玻璃科學、陶瓷科學和光學物理領域的精湛專業知識與深厚的製程和工程能力相結合，開發出眾多改變人們生活的創新成果和產品，成為五大關鍵市場的產業領導者。
於1971年進入台灣，為第一家在台灣設立LCD玻璃基板工廠並製造的供應商，在台中中部科學園區和台南科學園區建立了最現代、最高效率的生產工廠，提供市場領先技術製造高品質LCD玻璃基板。


ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:   
Perform network design, configuration, deployment, execution and tier 4 operational support of Network WAN and LAN environments.  Support network solutions including routing, switching, WAN optimization, load balancing, SDDC and SDWAN environments. For these services the candidate will:  
1. Design, configure, deploy, maintain, and administer network connectivity supporting Corning distributed locations, manufacturing plants and data centers, inclusive of WAN, LAN, network software, hardware, and tools 
2. Implement and support Data Center Network LAN distribution, Internet Edge, Cloud Connectivity, and appliances 
3. Troubleshoot, diagnose, and resolve hardware, software, and other network and system problems
4. Participating in root cause analysis on incidents, helping to drive identification of preventative actions meant to ensure problems don’t recur, and delivering on the tasks within those actions 
5. Create, review, update, and vet technical functional specification, low-level network solutions design documentation and operations guides/runbooks, ensuring those are complete, correct and kept current資訊工程學類

salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
*公司介紹：
外商公司已有165年歷史，於1971年進入台灣，為第一家在台灣設立LCD玻璃基板工廠並製造的供應商，在台中中部科學園區和台南科學園區建立了最現代、最高效率的生產工廠，提供市場領先技術製造高品質LCD玻璃基板。

工作內容與條件：
1.機械背景或冷凍空調科系，有無塵室經驗
2.需要進入無塵室工作，維持暖氣通風空氣調節和空調系統的優化
3.三年以上晶圓廠建廠或運轉經驗
4.疫情穩定後，需要出差，海外出差約15％，但若需要隔離，就會以台灣出差為主，屆時會依疫情狀況調整
5.英文中等程度

Job Description：
Scope of position：
Work with BOD (Bottom of drawing), Finishing, Inspection, and Packaging process areas for environmental optimization.
Work with expansion, rebuild, construction teams for new HVAC design and better enclosure capability.
Lead process change for quality improvement in Division-wide.
Define/refine base case of finishing attributes for process optimization improvement.
Review and analyze process data, performance, product data and respond to the result.
Plan, execute, tracking and document experimental design.
On site supervisor with external vendor and watch out the safety rule.

Education and Experience：
BS Engineering degree.
HVAC or Semiconductor cleanroom operation equivalent experiences.  
3 years work experiences.
Construction experiences of  C or Semiconductor cleanroom.

Required skills：
Cleanroom operation experience, skill and knowledge
Experiment design and data analysis skill
Project management skill.
Teamwork and communication skill.
Ability to work in different regions.
Mange external vendor.
English communication in written and verbal

Desired skills：
HVAC design for class 10 Cleanroom system including MEP system.
Experience with cleanness control in multi-process production Fab.
Experience with AutoCAD or SolidWorks - capable of reviewing drawings and models
Experience in DMAIC methodology and 6-sigma project.
Use simple statistical tools and Designed Experiments (DOE) in process problem solving.
Thermal and fluid dynamics knowledge background - capable of reviewing the design calculation.
High level Excel using.
Chemistry-related knowledge.

Soft skills：
Logical thinking for problem solving
Cross-cultural sensitivity.
Report and presentation skill.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, planning and organizing, building cross functional relationship.
Patience and perseverance.
Adapt to changing and fast-paced work.
Agile resilience.
Handle and arrange multiple tasks at the same time.

*本職缺為派遣工作，派遣一年一簽

職責要求
• Partner with Taiwan operations to evaluate, develop and deploy applicable EHS management system and process to ensure compliance with all levels of Taiwan Government our company Global safety Initiatives.
• Also, with input from and to corporate and along the joint EHS improvement strategy, establish direction for EHS improvement and cooperate with other top management in formulating and establishing company policies, operating procedures, and goals.

• Research, design, Propose, and Deploy the Safety improvement plan to facilitate the process and performance and to ensure compliance with EHS regulations as well as internal policies.

• Demonstrates a strong drive for results.
• Fluent in English and Mandarin.
• Professional certifications, is a plus.

job_title: Manufacturing Test Engineering_知名顧問公司 (3004296)
company: (獵頭)Accurate愛客獵股份有限公司(1111 高階獵才)
salary: 面議（經常性薪資4萬/月含以上）
job_info:
職責要求
1.Development and implementation of manufacturing test strategy during development and production phases of product lifecycle.
2.Work with Engineering and vendor test teams to design and assemble bench setups and test fixtures
3.Develop test requirements and methodology with Facebook team, implement manufacturing tests at vendor sites, troubleshoot and solve issues during product development and manufacturing ramp
4.Interface with the Engineering, Supply Chain, Manufacturing, Quality, and Vendor teams to assist in the development of test procedures, including First Article, Reliability, Environmental, Production and Final Acceptance Testing
5.Work directly with the test engineers providing guidance and support as necessary in test methods, equipment, and test set-ups
6.Coordination of and travel to suppliers (foreign and domestic) to establish technical and manufacturing processes required during product development and volume manufacturing ramp
7.Develops test specifications, procedures, and debug guides for test solutions
8.Sustain and make continuous improvements to tests in the production phase. Run experiments, collect and analyze test data to drive decisions
9.Technical issue resolution, establish lessons learnt practice and feedback to cross functional teams
10.Provide production support for manufacturing operations on a daily basis to remedy issues, enable on-time product deliveries, improve quality, and reduce cost, as well as analyze defect data and implement improvements to drive down defect rates.
11.maintain awareness of daily/weekly tasks/assignments to deliver products within the budgetary and schedule constraints. work closely with the assembly, process technicians, material expediters/planners, production leads and operation program managers to ensure successful hardware fabrication.
12.Identifies and implements processes and product improvement opportunities at the suppliers to reduce manufacturing costs while improving the first pass yield and product quality.

 任職資格
1.Bachelor’s or MS degree in electrical, mechanical, or manufacturing engineering.
2.4+ years of experience in consumer electronic product development & volume manufacturing
3.Experienced with domestic and/or international consumer electronics vendors and supply chain
4.Understanding of fundamental considerations of building hardware in development and volume production stages.
5.Experienced in managing detail test coverages and improving test efficiency in engineering and production phase
6.Experienced in Optical, Audio, RF testing, preferably has in-depth understanding in one or more of these areas
7.Fluent in English – verbal and written

MAJOR RESPONSIBILITIES
Supplier performance management 
•	Execute supplier and cost management system/metrics for assigned categories and create and maintain a related industry intelligence database, demonstrate continuous improvement
•	Negotiate all elements of assigned supplier relationships to ensure lowest total cost of procurement under TCO consideration. 
•	Responsible for securing compliance to terms and conditions of Supplier Agreement Letter
•	Develop and manage functional supplier relationships with assigned key/strategic suppliers to optimize financial and operational performance 
•	Support implementation of service metrics by driving supplier performance measured in i.e. QAR, on-time delivery, paperwork accuracy, etc.
Assortment & Business management 
•	Review existing supplier base and making decision on supplier consolidation. 
•	Review assortment sales performance & determine 1. Product phase-out recommendation 2. Sell price adjustment Recommendation 3. Skus and Supplier consolidation recommendation
•	Identify and execute opportunities for procurement cost reduction or better supplier performance. (including transfer of indirect agent-based business to factory direct, alternative sourcing terms& contract , contract re-negotiations based on various economic indicators & commodity price index , etc., working in conjunction with appropriate functional areas as required)
•	Implement and maintain supplier database for assigned suppliers
Oversea sister companies support 
•	Conduct supplier/market research and track global manufacturing and sourcing environment. Provide timely updates to the U.S. Headquarters and overseas offices and address any issues quickly
•	Resolve communication issues and reinforce communication process established between GGS and suppliers in addressing supplier performance issues. Resolve commercial issues associated with supplier performance issues, i.e. cost recovery for quality problems rework and on time shipment issues etc.

REQUIREMENTS:
•	Bachelor degree in engineering or business is required. (Previous exposure to manufacturing environment is a plus) 
•	4-6 years of experience in procurement, sourcing, merchandising, program management.
•	Prefer the sourcing experience in industrial products. 
•	Strong negotiation skill and knowledge of the negotiation process.
•	Good analytical skill on supplier performance and cost data, market intelligence in order to develop and implement action plans which drive supplier performance and cost improvement.
•	Proven ability to communicate to the right audience by using an effective communication method.
•	Good product knowledge and market intelligence in related category.
•	Strong problem solving capability and sense of result driven.
•	International experience and working experience in multinational company plus.
•	Frequent travel and international communications phone calls required.
•	Fluent in both oral and written English.
•	Proficient in using Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, etc.
